turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'm looking to place an order from Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what did you want to buy from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Looking for four small pies an dI would like to get chicken wings or a chicken barbecue on top. The crust have to gluten free though.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say u wanted 4 small pizzas, all chicken bbq, all with gluten free crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. the total for the order is $48.22.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order for pick up now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, it's set. it'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it, thanks for your help.
